Question: McGraw made such an impression on this person that she invited him to appear on her show.
Hints: Ben Shapiro of Townhall.com wrote: "this person is the most powerful woman in America.
Chevalier says this person ended the relationship when she met Stedman Graham.
At age 41, this person had a net worth of $340 million and replaced Bill Cosby as the only African American on the Forbes 400.
